products.title: Ninja Foodi 11 in 1 SmartLid Multi Cooker 6L OL550UK
products.body_html:
Ninja Foodi 11 in 1 SmartLid Multi Cooker 6L OL550UK

Revolutionize your cooking with the Ninja Foodi 11-in-1 SmartLid Multi-Cooker 6L OL550UK, designed to make meal preparation faster, easier, and healthier. Perfect for families or those who love hosting, this multi-cooker boasts a generous 6L capacity to serve up to 6 people, making it ideal for hearty meals in under 30 minutes.

SmartLid Technology: One Lid, Endless Possibilities

The Ninja OL550UK introduces a game-changing SmartLid, which allows you to switch seamlessly between Pressure Cook, Air Fry, and Combi-Steam modes. With just a slide of the lid, you unlock 11 versatile cooking functions that include:

  • Pressure Cook: Up to 70% faster than traditional methods.*
  • Air Fry: Achieve crispy results with up to 75% less fat than deep frying.**
  • Grill, Bake, and Dehydrate for endless cooking creativity.
  • Steam Air Fry and Steam Bake for moist, tender meals with a crispy finish.
  • Plus, Sear/Sauté, Slow Cook, Yoghurt, and more.

Combi-Steam Mode: Juicy, Crispy, and Fast

Unique to the Ninja Foodi OL550UK, the Combi-Steam Mode combines steam with convection heat to deliver meals that are moist inside and perfectly crisp outside. Use this mode for everything from succulent chicken with garlic potatoes to fluffy cakes and golden pastries.

Air Fry Mode: Healthier, Crispier Results

Enjoy guilt-free fried favorites with Air Fry Mode, using little to no oil. From golden fries to crispy chicken wings, the Ninja 11-in-1 delivers all the flavor and texture without the extra fat.

Pressure Cook Mode: Speed Meets Flavor

Pressure Cooking lets you prepare tender meats, stews, and more in a fraction of the time. Think juicy brisket, flavorful curries, and perfectly cooked pulled pork—all in under 30 minutes.

11 Cooking Functions for Every Meal

This all-in-one multi-cooker truly does it all:

  • Pressure Cook
  • Air Fry
  • Steam Air Fry
  • Steam Bake
  • Grill
  • Bake
  • Dehydrate
  • Slow Cook
  • Sear/Sauté
  • Steam
  • Yoghurt

Energy Efficient and Eco-Friendly

The Ninja Foodi OL550UK helps you save both time and money. With up to 65% energy savings†, you can cook smarter while reducing your bills.

Complete Accessories for Convenient Cooking

This Ninja 11-in-1 multi-cooker comes with:

  • 6L Non-Stick Cooking Pot: Perfect for a 2kg roast.
  • 3.7L Cook & Crisp Basket: Ideal for crispy fries, fitting up to 1.1kg.
  • Reversible Rack: Layer mains and sides or elevate food for even cooking.
    All accessories are dishwasher safe for hassle-free cleaning.

Recipes and Inspiration Included

Get started right away with the Ninja Foodi OL550UK recipe guide, featuring chef-created dishes and cooking charts to spark your creativity.

Why Choose Ninja Foodi OL550UK?

  • Quick family meals: Cook for up to 6 people in under 30 minutes.
  • Versatile cooking functions: From Pressure Cooking to Air Frying and beyond.
  • SmartLid convenience: One lid for multiple cooking modes.
  • Durable and easy to clean: Non-stick, dishwasher-safe accessories.

Upgrade your kitchen with the Ninja Foodi 11-in-1 SmartLid Multi-Cooker OL550UK, the ultimate appliance for quick, delicious, and healthy meals.

products.title: Ninja® Foodi® Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK
products.body_html:
Ninja AF300UK Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer

Discover the Ninja Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK, the ultimate solution for efficient, versatile, and healthy cooking. Whether you're preparing quick meals for the family or experimenting with new recipes, this powerful appliance delivers unmatched convenience with its innovative features. Designed for modern kitchens, the Ninja AF300UK Air Fryer ensures perfect results every time with its advanced technology and multi-functional cooking modes.

Cook 2 Foods, 2 Ways, and Finish Together

Say goodbye to juggling multiple cooking appliances. The Ninja Foodi Dual Zone AF300UK Air Fryer features 2 Independent Cooking Zones, allowing you to prepare two different dishes at different temperatures, times, and settings simultaneously. Thanks to the SYNC feature, both dishes are ready at the same time – no cold sides or unevenly cooked meals. Whether you're roasting chicken while air frying fries or baking salmon alongside crisp vegetables, this air fryer handles it all effortlessly.

More Than Just an Air Fryer

The Ninja Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK offers 6 versatile cooking modes to expand your culinary possibilities:

  • Air Fry: Enjoy crispy results with up to 75% less fat than traditional frying methods, using little to no oil. Perfect for chicken wings, chips, fishcakes, and more.
  • Max Crisp: Cook frozen foods to golden perfection in minutes with temperatures up to 240°C. Ideal for scampi, onion rings, or French fries.
  • Roast: Elevate your meals with perfectly roasted meats, vegetables, and fish.
  • Bake: Prepare fresh bread, pasta bakes, muffins, and cakes effortlessly.
  • Dehydrate: Create healthy snacks like dried fruit, vegetable crisps, or homemade beef jerky.
  • Reheat: Bring leftovers back to life, restoring their fresh-out-of-the-oven flavor.

Match Settings for Bigger Portions

Hosting guests or feeding a large family? Use the MATCH feature to double your portions with the same cooking program and time across both drawers. From large batches of chips to party-ready snacks, the Ninja Foodi AF300UK has got you covered.

Perfect for Every Occasion

Whether you're cooking for one or catering to diverse dietary needs, this Ninja Air Fryer AF300UK is designed to adapt. Use one drawer for vegetarian meals and the other for meat dishes, ensuring everyone gets their preferred dish without cross-contamination.

Effortless Operation and Cleanup

The Ninja Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK features an intuitive digital control panel with a countdown timer, making it easy to track cooking progress. Adjustable temperature controls let you customize your recipes, while the Auto-Adjust Fan optimizes cooking performance for every function. Cleaning up is a breeze with non-stick, dishwasher-safe 3.8L cooking drawers.

Why Choose the Ninja Foodi AF300UK?

  • Faster than fan ovens: Cook up to 75% faster.
  • Healthier meals: Air fry with significantly less fat.
  • Endless versatility: From snacks to main courses and desserts.
  • Chef-inspired recipes: Get started with a recipe guide included.

Elevate your cooking game with the Ninja Foodi Dual Zone 7.6L Air Fryer AF300UK – your ultimate kitchen companion for healthier, quicker, and tastier meals. Whether it's crispy chicken, golden fries, or perfectly roasted vegetables, this Ninja for Kitchen innovation delivers every time. Perfect your mealtime routine with the best in class Ninja Foodi AF300UK.

products.body_html:
Ninja Air Fryer PRO 4.7L AF140UK: Ultimate Kitchen Companion for Healthier, Crispier Meals

Achieve perfectly crispy results with the Ninja Air Fryer PRO 4.7L AF140UK. This innovative kitchen appliance cooks your favorite foods quickly and healthily, using little to no oil, reducing fat content by up to 75% compared to traditional frying methods*.

Superior Crisping with AirCrisp Technology

Experience the perfect crunch with temperatures reaching up to 210°C. AirCrisp Technology envelops your food in superheated air, ensuring hot, crispy results every time while using less energy than a conventional oven**.

Versatile Cooking Functions

Ideal for both air frying beginners and seasoned chefs looking to upgrade, this compact air fryer is user-friendly with its digital controls and four versatile cooking functions:

1. AIR FRY: Achieve up to 75% less fat than traditional frying methods*. Create healthier versions of your fried favorites, including burgers, koftas, frozen chips, and fish fingers. Try new recipes like juicy chicken breasts, jacket potatoes, crispy spring rolls, and even air fryer nachos or pizza rolls.

2. ROAST: Perfect for cooking for two, this countertop appliance makes fluffy, crispy roast potatoes, roasted pork chops, herby root vegetables with goat’s cheese, and even a whole 1kg roast chicken.

3. DEHYDRATE: Remove moisture from sliced fruit, vegetables, herbs, and other ingredients to create healthy, homemade snacks, garnishes, and flavorings.

4. REHEAT: Restore leftovers to their just-out-of-the-oven texture and taste, without the sogginess. Ideal for reheating pizza, spring rolls, and more.

Spacious Yet Compact Design

The 4.7L drawer is perfect for feeding up to two people or cooking a smaller portion without occupying too much counter space. The removable crisper plate ensures 360° air circulation for even crisping.

Easy-to-Use Digital Controls

Simplify your cooking with digital controls that allow you to easily set the function, temperature, and timer at the touch of a button. The wide temperature range of 40-210°C lets you do everything from gently reheating leftovers to crisping up a golden toasted sandwich with a melted cheese center. For convenience, the air fryer automatically stops cooking when the timer ends.

Effortless Cleaning

No more worrying about cleanup—the removable drawer and crisper plate are non-stick and easy to clean.

Included Recipe Inspiration

Start cooking immediately with the included chef-created recipe book, packed with recipes and cook charts for all your air fryer favorites.

Peace of Mind Guarantee

For added assurance, Ninja offers a free 2-year guarantee upon registration (UK & ROI only).

Cook everything from fries and crisps to vegetables and beef jerky thanks to the Ninja AF400UK Air Fryer. Using little to no oil, this handy appliance lets you create your favourite meals and sides just the way you like them with up to 75% less fat than traditional frying methods.
